▝▜█████▛▘  Haiku 4.5 · Claude Max
  ▘▘ ▝▝    ~/.local/state/v0/claudeless/tree/v0-chore-worker/claudeless

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
❯ Try "refactor app.rs"
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
  ! for bash mode      double tap esc to clear input  ctrl + shift + - to
  / for commands       shift + Tab to auto-accept     undo
  @ for file paths     edits                          ctrl + z to suspend
  & for background     ctrl + o for verbose output    ctrl + v to paste
                       ctrl + t to show todos         images
                       \⏎ for newline                 meta + p to switch
                                                      model
                                                      ctrl + s to stash
                                                      prompt
                                                      ctrl + g to edit in
                                                      $EDITOR
                                                      /keybindings to
                                                      customize
